Returns: true if the match is successful; false otherwise
Parameters: the cookie source to match against
match(org.apache.http.cookie.Cookie, org.FullName: public boolean match (Cookie cookie, CookieOrigin origin)

Parameters: the cookie source to validate against
validate(org.apache.http.cookie.Cookie,.FullName: public void validate (Cookie cookie, CookieOrigin origin)

Parameters: cookie attribute value from the cookie response header
parse(org.apache.http.cookie.SetCookie,.FullName: public void parse (SetCookie cookie, String domain)

Returns: true if the specified host matches the given domain.
Parameters: host name where cookie is received from or being sent to.
domainMatch(java.lang.String, java.lang..Description: Performs domain-match as defined by the RFC2965. Host A's name domain-matches host B's if their host name strings string-compare equal; or A is a HDN string and has the form NB, where N is a non-empty name string, B has the form .B', and B' is a HDN string. (So, x.y.com domain-matches .Y.com but not Y.com.)
domainMatch(java.lang.String, java.lang..FullName: public boolean domainMatch (String host, String domain)
